channel.title: Arena on Blommaerts Edwin
channel.description: Recent content in Arena on Blommaerts Edwin

item.title: I created a Tree!
item.description: I was tired of seeing my little man running around stark naked without anywhere to hide behind. So I created a tree for him. Using Y-sort, collision shapes and static bodies I made it possible for him to go behind the tree but not go through it. Behold my creation!

item.title: Added a start menu placeholder to my game
item.description: As part of my do something every day, I’ve put together a quick placeholder start screen of my game. Here is my little Frankenstein’s monster and, just like its name partner, it is ugly to look at but, it is alive!
